title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5504.17 - Abandoned vehicles and property
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5504.17 - Abandoned vehicles and property

State Regulations
(a) Vehicles left unattended or any other
property abandoned in or upon the facilities may be removed by the
authority. (b) Disabled or abandoned
vehicles may be removed from the facilities by the authority. The cost of such
removal may be assessed by the authority against the owner or operator
thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5504.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
